Keywords: Hellions , Marauders , Quiet Council , Scientist , X-Men
Real Name: Nathaniel Essex
Special Powers
RALLY (1): Friendly Attack Rolls . Plasticity. // Once per turn, you may remove one of Mister Sinister's RALLY dice to replace a die in an opposing attack roll with it.
MAKE NO MISTAKE, I AM IN CHARGE: Leadership, Outwit, Shape Change. When Mister Sinister uses Shape Change and succeeds, he can't be attacked this turn.

Comments
October 29, 2022
tidge
The dial isn't going to cause anyone to jump for joy, except possibly for having one of the best RALLY powers in the game. I do appreciate that this is a sub-50-point version of the character more suitable for joining teams as opposed to having to build teams around that character. I also like the rather simple end-dial combination of powers (plus traited Plasticity) that give this character options and cannot be trivially dealt with by based opponents.
